1.0.name: wordpress/plugin-stats
1.0.description: Plugin Stats provides a shortcode, template function, and dashboard widget which display graphs of the number of downloads completed for plugins hosted at WordPress.org. The green bar on the graph shows the standard deviation of the downloads. Also, today's downloads are shown using a red link crossing the graph. The graphic is provided using the Google Charts API.
